name: Pokemon Blackout Version (Drinking Game)
description:
Video-game version of the pokemon drinking game board games from reddit.

http://www.reddit.com/r/gaming/comments/rbuo4/new_full_color_high_res_pokemon_drinking_game/

http://i.imgur.com/FUBFa.jpg

Planned Features:

- Current Player Display UI

- Ban player battles on Gold Tiles

- Move players back one tile for losing a player battle

- Skip rolling if one square away from an unvisted gold tile

- Controller support

- Optional dokkan-style movement mode

- Movement mode selection screen

- Randomly generated/ordered tiles

- Better fullscreen support

- Save player names/pokemon choices for future games
